mapper.insert: insert into issueTracker.developer_level ( developer_unique_name, efficiency, contribution, quality, total_level, involved_repo_count, duty_type ) values ( #{developerName}, #{efficiency}, #{contribution}, #{quality}, #{totalLevel}, #{involvedRepoCount}, #{dutyType} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE efficiency = #{efficiency}, contribution = #{contribution}, quality = #{quality}, total_level = #{totalLevel}, involved_repo_count = #{involvedRepoCount}, duty_type = #{dutyType}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT developer FROM issueTracker.commit where repo_id = #{repoUuid}
SELECT distinct account_name,account_status FROM issueTracker.account
SELECT repo_name FROM issueTracker.sub_repository WHERE repo_uuid = #{repoUuid}
SELECT project_name FROM issueTracker.sub_repository WHERE repo_uuid = #{repoUuid}
SELECT project_name FROM issueTracker.account_project AS p WHERE p.account_uuid = #{account_uuid} AND p.account_role = 'LEADER'
SELECT language FROM issueTracker.sub_repository WHERE repo_uuid = #{repoUuid}
SELECT project_name FROM issueTracker.project where id = #{projectId}
SELECT id FROM issueTracker.project WHERE project_name = #{projectName}
SELECT distinct (id) FROM issueTracker.project
SELECT distinct (repo_uuid) FROM issueTracker.sub_repository WHERE project_name = #{projectName}
